titles.title: ADAAPT Act
A bill to amend the Clean Air Act to modify provisions relating to international border areas, marginal areas, and rural transport areas, and for other purposes.
ADAAPT Act
Air Designation Actions in Areas of Pollutant Transport Act

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.

bill.summary:
Air Designation Actions in Areas of Pollutant Transport Act or the ADAAPT Act
This bill amends the Clean Air Act to revise requirements for certain nonattainment areas, including provisions related to international border areas, marginal areas, and rural transport areas.
